name: Qadeer Masood
story: Qadeer Masood was born and raised in a small village in Iran. He joined the military at the age of 18 and quickly proved himself to be a skilled scout. He was promoted to the rank of Private and assigned to a reconnaissance unit. Qadeer is known among his peers for his bravery, his quick-thinking in the face of danger, and his cautious approach to dangerous situations. He is an invaluable member of his unit, and his skills as a scout have helped his team win many battles against their enemy.
